Title: Kung Fu Panda 3
Overview: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.
Tagline: Grab destiny by the rice dumplings.
Keywords: china, martial arts, kung fu, village, panda, sequel, talking animal, anthropomorphism, dragon, ancient china, wuxia, woman director
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, DreamWorks Animation, China Film Co., Oriental DreamWorks
